channel.title: How long does rune defender take?
channel.description:
Currently at black?
How long with wealth, and how long without? Also, how many tokens?

item.title: How long does rune defender take?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:26, topic:141136”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=193383.msg1753663#msg1753663 date=1189699785]
It’s random.

If anyone claims they got it in less than 30 solid minutes of fighting, they’re probably lying. It took me a good 2 hours and I was dharoking and getting over 1k xp a minute.
[/quote]Not really, it’s just a matter of luck, wealth has nothing to do with it. And 30mins of solid fighting means over 45mins because you don’t fight the Cyclops right one after another.[/quote]Explain this:[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:19, topic:141136”]I have like 20 rune in bank, beat that. Got from nothing to rune in 30 mins.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How long does rune defender take?

item.title: How long does rune defender take?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:21, topic:141136”]It’s random.

If anyone claims they got it in less than 30 solid minutes of fighting, they’re probably lying. It took me a good 2 hours and I was dharoking and getting over 1k xp a minute.[/quote]Not really, it’s just a matter of luck, wealth has nothing to do with it. And 30mins of solid fighting means over 45mins because you don’t fight the Cyclops right one after another.

Read full topic

item.title: How long does rune defender take?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

with ring a of wealth it can take less then a hour depending on your luck but this is my what i have learned getting defenders… the first defender you get after like 50-60 kills (for me) then you get the next defender in 10-15 kills (for me again) and it goes like that then next would be 50-60 kills and the next would be 10-15 kills. and so on and so forth… but i am a very unlucky person. my first defender took me 4 hours to get because i spent 2 and a half hours getting steel defender…

Read full topic
item.source: How long does rune defender take?

item.title: How long does rune defender take?
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

from black mabe 300-450 tokens its very random though, when I got my addy, the next one i got rune… so weird

but it dosent take long less that 1 hour , what I did was, bring a dds, and wip and buy super att and str from downstairs and start killing
